video.title: Hi-5 House
video.synopsis: Iconic children's pop group Hi-5 continues to teach kids about animals, colors, music and more in this rebooted version of the original series.

episodes.synopsis: Kids can join their favorite Hi-5 friends for a musical adventure as they stomp, swish and sway with all kinds of animals and explore their homes.
episodes.title: Animal Homes

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 invites kids to enjoy beautiful flowers, find enchantment in a fairy garden and have a blast at a musical insect party.
episodes.title: Flower Garden

episodes.synopsis: The forecast is fine at the Hi-5 House, with some hot reggae beats and cool cloud-counting. The Hi-5 crew invites their friends to weather it all.
episodes.title: Weather

episodes.synopsis: In a world full of wonders, the Hi-5 gang takes kids on a thrilling journey, from Stevie's Wonder Park to a giant lily pad ride in the Amazon.
episodes.title: Wonders of the World

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 invites young outer space explorers on a journey through the galaxy, where they can visit other planets and be guests at a Jupiter Jazz party.
episodes.title: Stars and Space

episodes.synopsis: The Hi-5 gang believes that everyone can be a superhero. They reveal their own special powers as they become the coolest action heroes in the house.
episodes.title: Superheroes - Special Powers

episodes.synopsis: Every community has a hero, including the Hi-5 House. Kids can visit local heroes like firefighters and even a musical lollipop man!
episodes.title: Local Heroes - Community

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 explores the world of yummy, healthy food so that kids can learn about the lip-smacking meals and snacks that can give them superpowers.
episodes.title: Super Food

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 explores the amazing world of animals, where flying creatures and a band of beetles show off the things that they can do.
episodes.title: Super Animals

episodes.synopsis: Everyone has a hero, so Hi-5 explores a few of their own: a footy-loving dad, an old-school dancer and rusty superhero Sir Bucket Head!
episodes.title: My Heroes

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 challenges their friends to be daring! Kids can face their fear of the dark or climb a huge mountain and find out how great it feels.
episodes.title: Daring

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 encourages kids to  have fun with new experiences, from first days at school to trying a different color hair and more.
episodes.title: Trying New Things

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 invites friends to use their imaginations to brighten the day, starting with creating a world out of plain paper and composing a soapy symphony.
episodes.title: Making Your Own Fun

episodes.synopsis: There are always things to do in the Hi-5 House. Kids can play a musical cleaning-up game and learn how to have a great time doing everyday tasks.
episodes.title: Things to Do

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 welcomes kids to their very own musical amusement park, where plenty of rides, magical adventures and lots of laughter await.
episodes.title: Hi-5 Fun Park

episodes.synopsis: H-5 takes kids on a fun ride where they can learn about transportation, with plenty of cars, trains and buses to explore on the road to adventure.
episodes.title: Transport

episodes.synopsis: A trip to the city shows kids all sorts of fun jobs people have, from getting creative as a graphic designer to cooking up a storm as a busy chef.
episodes.title: Jobs

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 has fun in the city, exercising in the city park, taking a ride with a singing bus driver and taking off for an exciting trip to Venice.
episodes.title: Fun in the City

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 travels back in time to visit great cities from the past. Kids can follow a llama trail in Machu Picchu or learn about life in ancient Rome.
episodes.title: Cities from the Past

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 invites kids to leap into the future and explore its cities, where they can play a space-age game of dress-up and do some cool time traveling.
episodes.title: Future Cities

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 invites kids to enjoy a merry time of playing sports. There are pirate games, tae kwon do moves and other energy-filled ways to have some fun.
episodes.title: Sports

episodes.synopsis: The Hi-5 gang shows kids lots of ways that they can become part of a team, from doubles tennis to helping sick friends and more.
episodes.title: When Am I a Team Player?

episodes.synopsis: From jellyfish to singing alpacas, Hi-5's own team explores all sorts of animal groups and takes a look at how animals love working together.
episodes.title: Animal Teams

episodes.synopsis: Hi-5 loves to be a team, so kids are invited to join in for a play date where everyone has fun together and shows plenty of team spirit.
episodes.title: Teams

episodes.synopsis: A fun-filled look at how communities work takes High-5 to a firefighting drill and a concert performed by an adorable choir of puppies and kittens.
episodes.title: Cooperation and Communication
